messages.message: Properties of parameter "param2" from ois.[2].endpoints.[2].parameters.[0], must match it's properties in ois.[2].apiSpecifications.paths
OIS "ois2" must contain endpoint "'endpt2", as it is specified in triggers.rrp.[2].oisTitle
OIS "ois2" must contain security scheme "sec2", as it is specified in apiCredentials.[2]
